channel.title: [help!] still need help paying!
channel.description:
Hello, MorparScape people
SOURCE: HYBRID PVP CLIENT: HYBRID PVP
Okay, there is a threw things is going on wrong with the client When i use the client it takes so long to load at Connecting to update server at least about 2-minute then it load past connecting to update server i need help how to fix this.
Like on RevolutionX they fixed it they got 2 server CLASSIC AND MODERN server now
If anyone like to help me to fix this problem i will be happy about this! This need to be fixed soon!
1 more thing's
Trying to add things to quest tabs is not letting me i done everything right in CLIENT.JAVA compile saved no error log back in the client the quest tabs is still the same please can someone able to help me.
Get back to me soon as possbile.
